keyMoments.title: Enel Joins the Survival Game
keyMoments.description: Enel personally enters the survival game in Upper Yard, directly confronting the remaining contestants.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Enel's active participation in eliminating fighters, showcasing his overwhelming power.

keyMoments.title: Enel's Five-Minute Challenge
keyMoments.description: Enel arrogantly offers Kamakiri five minutes to attack him freely without any counterattack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Enel's god complex and absolute confidence in his Logia powers.
keyMoments.quote: I'll give you five minutes. Attack me however you like. I won't move a muscle or fight back.

keyMoments.title: Logia Intangibility Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Kamakiri's spear passes completely through Enel's head without causing damage, revealing his Logia intangibility.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration that Enel possesses a Logia Devil Fruit, making him virtually invincible to physical attacks.
keyMoments.quote: It's useless. Thunder is something humans can never truly fathom.

keyMoments.title: Goro Goro no Mi Revealed
keyMoments.description: Enel reveals he consumed the Goro Goro no Mi, granting him complete control over lightning.
keyMoments.significance: Explains Enel's god-like powers and establishes the fruit as one of the most powerful seen in the series.

keyMoments.title: 1,000,000 Volt Vari Debut
keyMoments.description: Enel unleashes his 1,000,000 Volt Vari attack, defeating Kamakiri and 20 other fighters simultaneously.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Enel's named voltage attacks, showcasing the terrifying offensive power of his Devil Fruit.
keyMoments.quote: Your five minutes are up. 1,000,000 Volt Vari!

reveals.information: Possesses the Goro Goro no Mi (Rumble-Rumble Fruit), a Logia-type Devil Fruit granting control over lightning
Can transform his body into lightning, making physical attacks pass through him harmlessly
Can use 1,000,000 Volt Vari attack to defeat multiple opponents simultaneously

abilities.description: A devastating electrical discharge that travels through conductive surfaces, capable of defeating multiple opponents at once.
Ability to transform body into lightning, allowing physical attacks to pass through harmlessly.

keyMoments.title: Accepts Enel's Challenge
keyMoments.description: Kamakiri accepts Enel's five-minute challenge, attempting to kill the self-proclaimed god.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kamakiri's bravery and determination despite facing overwhelming odds.

keyMoments.title: Spear Through Enel's Head
keyMoments.description: Kamakiri stabs Enel directly through the skull, but the attack passes through harmlessly due to Logia powers.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the futility of physical attacks against Enel's lightning body.

keyMoments.title: Burn Blade Attack Fails
keyMoments.description: Kamakiri uses his Burn Blade dial weapon against Enel, but it proves equally ineffective.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even dial-based weapons cannot harm Enel's Logia form.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by 1,000,000 Volt Vari
keyMoments.description: Kamakiri is completely defeated by Enel's electrical attack after the five minutes expire.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes the overwhelming power gap between Enel and even the strongest warriors.

abilities.description: A dial-based weapon using fire capabilities for combat.

reveals.information: One of the strongest Shandia warriors, acknowledged even by Enel

keyMoments.title: Teams Up with Gan Fall
keyMoments.description: Nami teams up with Gan Fall to fight Hotori and Kotori aboard the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's ability to work strategically with allies in combat.

keyMoments.title: Uses Fog Tempo
keyMoments.description: Nami uses her Clima-Tact to create Fog Tempo, obscuring the battlefield.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates her developing combat skills and strategic use of the Clima-Tact.

keyMoments.title: First Use of Impact Dial
keyMoments.description: Using Gan Fall's gauntlet, Nami successfully uses an Impact Dial in combat for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: Shows her adaptability in using Skypiea's dial technology in battle.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Hotori
keyMoments.description: Nami's combination of Fog Tempo and Impact Dial successfully defeats Hotori.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Nami's growth as a combatant using strategy over raw power.

abilities.description: Creates thick fog using the Clima-Tact to obscure the battlefield and hide her position.
Uses an Impact Dial (via Gan Fall's gauntlet) to store and release kinetic energy for powerful attacks.

reveals.information: Shows significant development in combat skills, using tactics and new tools effectively

keyMoments.title: Teams Up with Nami
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall teams up with Nami to fight Hotori and Kotori.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates his continued support for the Straw Hats and willingness to fight Enel's forces.

keyMoments.title: Defeats Kotori
keyMoments.description: Gan Fall defeats Kotori using his combat experience and dial mastery.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that despite his age, he remains a formidable fighter.

keyMoments.title: Rescues Aisa from Sky Fish
keyMoments.description: Conis helps rescue Aisa from an attacking Sky Fish during their journey through Upper Yard.
keyMoments.significance: Shows her bravery in navigating dangerous Upper Yard to help the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Conis successfully reaches the Going Merry with Pagaya and Aisa.
keyMoments.significance: Brings allies together and provides assistance to the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Rescues Aisa from Sky Fish
keyMoments.description: Pagaya helps rescue Aisa from an attacking Sky Fish.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates his courage in helping others despite the dangers.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Going Merry with Supplies
keyMoments.description: Pagaya reaches the Going Merry bringing supplies and a refurbished waver.
keyMoments.significance: Provides valuable resources to the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Suggests Escape Plan
keyMoments.description: Pagaya suggests the Straw Hats escape Skypiea using his Milky Dial.
keyMoments.significance: Shows his concern for their safety and provides a potential escape route.

keyMoments.title: Rescued by Conis and Pagaya
keyMoments.description: Aisa is rescued from a Sky Fish attack after her waver was damaged.
keyMoments.significance: Brings Aisa into contact with the Straw Hats and allies.

keyMoments.title: Arrives at Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Aisa arrives at the Going Merry with Conis and Pagaya.
keyMoments.significance: Her Mantra abilities will prove valuable in the upcoming events.

reveals.information: Possesses Mantra (Observation Haki) abilities that help sense danger

keyMoments.title: Battles Nami
keyMoments.description: Hotori fights against Nami aboard the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Tests Nami's developing combat abilities.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Nami
keyMoments.description: Hotori is defeated by Nami's combination of Fog Tempo and Impact Dial.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that the priests are not invincible.

keyMoments.title: Battles Gan Fall
keyMoments.description: Kotori fights against Gan Fall aboard the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Tests the former God of Skypiea's combat skills.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Gan Fall
keyMoments.description: Kotori is defeated by Gan Fall's superior combat experience.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that experience and skill can overcome the priests.
